articles.author: Alex Gilyadov
articles.title: Stephen King's IT Scores Huge Opening Night - IGN
articles.description: IT's opening night gross is only behind Disney's Guardians 2 and Beauty and the Beast for 2017.

articles.author: Terri Schwartz
articles.title: Seth MacFarlane's The Orville Isn't a Star Trek Parody, but a Love Letter - IGN
articles.description: "I'm tired of being told everything is grim and dystopian and people are going to be murdered for food," says Seth MacFarlane.

articles.author: Evan Campbell
articles.title: How an Emergency Fix Saved Rocket League's Servers at Launch - IGN
articles.description: Design director Corey Davis discusses the band-aid solution used early on for the game, which involved someone pressing a button all night.

articles.author: Lucy O'Brien
articles.title: IGN First - How Code Vein is Dark Souls Done Differently - IGN
articles.description: Bandai Namco Studios on why Code Vein's companion system and flexible character upgrades makes for a fresh spin on the Dark Souls formula.

articles.title: Fear the Walking Dead: Season 3 Exclusive Midseason Premiere Clip - IGN Video
articles.description: Madison (Kim Dickens) runs into Strand (Colman Domingo) in this exclusive clip from Fear the Walking Dead's Season 3 midseason premiere, which airs Sunday, September 10th on AMC.

articles.title: Madden NFL 18 Tips and Our Favorite Indie Games from PAX West - The IGN Show Ep. 29 - IGN Video
articles.description: 3 tips for how to dominate in Madden MUT Squads, indie games you need to know about, and so much more in our latest episode.

articles.author: Matt Porter
articles.title: Halo Backwards Compatibility Releases Taking 'Extra Time' - IGN
articles.description: Extra polish is being added, so the wait will be a little while longer.

articles.title: Destiny 2: How to Start Heroic Events - Best Way to Play - IGN Video
articles.description: Heroic Events are more difficult versions of Public Events in Destiny 2 - so of course they award you more loot.

articles.author: Chris Reed
articles.title: Dishonored: Death of the Outsider Preorder Guide - IGN
articles.description: Get the best deal on Dishonored: Death of the Outsider when it launches on PC, PS4, and Xbox One on September 15.

articles.author: Fran Mirabella III
articles.title: Why Mario + Rabbids Made Him Cry - IGN Expert Mode Ep. 1 - IGN
articles.description: Talking to the Mario + Rabbids game director, learning about working with Nintendo and his emotional journey.
